item.title: How to Generate Synthetic Data?
item.description: A review of generative algorithms including WGAN and Deep Generative Networks for creating synthetic datasets.

item.title: Autoencoders â€” Deep Learning bits #1
item.description: An introduction to autoencoders with code examples for image reconstruction and segmentation, relevant for anomaly detection.

item.title: Train YOLO for Object Detection on a Custom Dataset using Python
item.description: A practical guide on how to train YOLO for object detection on a custom dataset using Darknet and Python, including data preparation and model configuration.

item.title: Watershed Segmentation Using OpenCV
item.description: A comprehensive technical guide to the watershed segmentation algorithm, with OpenCV implementation for separating touching objects and industrial defect detection.

item.title: Creating Synthetic Data for Machine Learning
item.description: A tutorial on creating synthetic data to train a model for object detection, using YOLOv5.

item.title: Deploy Custom Object Detection using Flask & Python, Step by Step
item.description: A step-by-step guide to deploying a custom YOLO object detection model on localhost using Flask and Python.

item.title: Semi-supervised Anomaly Detection using Auto Encoders
item.description: A convolutional auto encoder based approach for semi-supervised anomaly detection in images, including a PyTorch implementation.
